head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ZINSSER, BARBARA L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ZINSSER, BARBARA L.

block.p: ZINSSER-Barbara L. A memorial service to celebrate the life of Barbara L. Zinsser, who passed away on August 1st, will be held at the Calvary Episcopal Church at Park Avenue South and 21 St on September 21, 2000 at 5:30 PM. Contributions in our mother's memory may be made to Robert College of Istanbul, 276 Fifth Ave, Suite 905, New York, NY 10001; American Farm School, 1133 Broadway, 16th Floor, New York, New York 10010; or The Horticultural Society of New York, 128 W. 58th Street, New York, NY 10019. Leslie Armstrong, Judith Zinsser, Katherine Zinsser
